Translations.Text: Hav ni send angxel ni send him form hom ni kept them just as konfuz as ili konfuz nun
Messengers vi ridiculed est those mok them sufer consequences de their ridiculing
Dir Roam ter not consequences rejectors
Dir, "Al whom aparten cxio heavens ter? Dir, "Al DI. Li dekret mercy est His atribu! Li surely summon vi all Tag Resurrection est inevitable. Unu perd their anim est those disbelieve
Al Him aparten cxio logx en nokt tag! Li est Hearer Knower
dir Shall mi akcept DI as Lord Mastr when Li est Initiator de heavens ter Li feeds ne fed Dir mi komand plej devoted submitter ne est idol worshiper
dir mi tim se mi disobeyed my Lord retribution awesome tag
Whoever sxpar (retribution) ke tag ating His mercy! this est greatest triumf
Di tusx vi adversity neniom relieve gxi escept Li. Kaj se Li tusx vi ben Li est Omnipotent
Li est Supreme His creatures. Li est plej Sagx Cognizant
